chapter.title: Sharing
chapter.para: This chapter discusses the sharing of entities feature in DHIS 2.

section.title: Sharing of objects
section.para: A large part of the objects in DHIS 2, like reports, charts and indicators, can be shared. Sharing means making an object, like a report, available for reading or modification to a group of users or to everyone.
For instance for reports, the sharing dialog can be opened by clicking on the "share" button next to each report in the list. The sharing dialog is where sharing is controlled.

section.title: Supported objects
section.para: Currently the objects which support sharing are: Indicator, indicator group, indicator group set, data dictionary, data set, program, user group, standard report, resource, report table, chart and map.
